title: A repeated measures GWAS in relatives: detecting age-specific genetic effects on maternal depression
details: C Rayner, T McAdams, E Ystrom, Z Ayorech - 2024
abstract: Background: Genome-wide association studies (GWAS) of depression typically rely on cross-sectional designs, using lifetime history (LTH) of a diagnosis as the primary outcome. While this strategy has been essential towards accumulating the samples …

title: CaMKIIβ deregulation contributes to neuromuscular junction destabilization in Myotonic Dystrophy type I
details: D Falcetta, S Quirim, I Cocchiararo, F Chabry… - Skeletal Muscle, 2024
abstract: Abstract Background Myotonic Dystrophy type I (DM1) is the most common muscular dystrophy in adults. Previous reports have highlighted that neuromuscular junctions (NMJs) deteriorate in skeletal muscle from DM1 patients and mouse models thereof …
